sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REGNARD (John Francis), one of the beſt French comic writers after Moliere, was born at Paris in 1647⅛ He had ſcarcely finiſſied his ſtudies, when an ardent paſſion for travelling carried him over the greateſt part of Europe, when he fettled in his own country, he was made a treaſurer of France, and lieutenant of the waters and foreſts : he wrote a great many comedies ; and, though naturally of a gay genius, died of chagrin in the 52d year or his age. His works, conſtſting of comedies and travels, werc printed at Rouen, in 5 vola I2mo, 1732.
